statements: SELECT * FROM InventoryForecast;
SELECT product_id, product_name, demand_forecast FROM InventoryForecast WHERE optimal_inventory_level > 50;
SELECT product_name, demand_forecast FROM InventoryForecast WHERE replenishment_lead_time > 7 ORDER BY demand_forecast DESC;
SELECT product_id, optimal_inventory_level FROM InventoryForecast WHERE demand_forecast < 100 ORDER BY product_id;
SELECT product_id, product_name, replenishment_lead_time FROM InventoryForecast WHERE demand_forecast BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM InventoryForecast WHERE demand_forecast > 100 AND optimal_inventory_level < 50 ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, demand_forecast FROM InventoryForecast WHERE replenishment_lead_time < 5 ORDER BY demand_forecast ASC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, optimal_inventory_level FROM InventoryForecast WHERE product_name LIKE 'Chair%' ORDER BY optimal_inventory_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM InventoryForecast WHERE replenishment_lead_time BETWEEN 2 AND 4 ORDER BY product_name;
SELECT COUNT(product_id) AS total_products, AVG(demand_forecast) AS avg_demand FROM InventoryForecast;
SELECT * FROM demand_forecast WHERE forecasted_demand > 100
SELECT product_id, forecast_date FROM demand_forecast WHERE forecast_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31'
SELECT current_stock, reorder_level FROM inventory WHERE product_id = 123
SELECT product_id, forecasted_demand FROM demand_forecast ORDER BY forecasted_demand DESC
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE current_stock < reorder_level
SELECT * FROM demand_forecast WHERE product_id = 1 AND forecast_date = '2022-10-01';
SELECT product_id, forecasted_demand FROM demand_forecast ORDER BY forecasted_demand DESC;
SELECT product_id, forecast_date, forecasted_demand FROM demand_forecast WHERE forecasted_demand > 1000;
SELECT * FROM demand_forecast JOIN inventory ON demand_forecast.product_id = inventory.product_id;
SELECT product_id, current_stock, reorder_level FROM inventory WHERE current_stock < reorder_level ORDER BY current_stock ASC;
SELECT * FROM DemandForecast;
SELECT product_name, forecasted_demand FROM DemandForecast WHERE forecast_date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT inventory_id, current_inventory FROM InventoryLevels ORDER BY current_inventory DESC;
SELECT product_name, order_quantity, order_date FROM ReplenishmentOrders WHERE order_quantity > 100 ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT product_name, current_inventory, replenishment_date FROM InventoryLevels WHERE current_inventory < 50;
SELECT * FROM DemandForecast ORDER BY forecast_date DESC, product_name ASC
SELECT product_name, forecasted_demand FROM DemandForecast WHERE forecasted_demand > 100
SELECT product_name, current_inventory FROM InventoryLevels WHERE current_inventory < 50 ORDER BY current_inventory ASC
SELECT product_name, order_date FROM ReplenishmentOrders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT * FROM DemandForecast INNER JOIN InventoryLevels ON DemandForecast.product_name = InventoryLevels.product_name
SELECT * FROM DemandForecast;
SELECT product_id, forecast_date FROM DemandForecast WHERE demand_qty > 100;
SELECT MAX(demand_qty) AS max_demand FROM DemandForecast;
SELECT product_id, current_stock, optimal_stock FROM InventoryLevels WHERE current_stock < optimal_stock;
SELECT product_id, SUM(sale_qty) AS total_sales FROM SalesHistory GROUP BY product_id;
SELECT * FROM DemandForecast WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT product_id, demand_qty FROM DemandForecast WHERE forecast_date = '2023-11-15';
SELECT SUM(demand_qty) AS total_demand FROM DemandForecast;
SELECT * FROM InventoryLevels WHERE current_stock < optimal_stock;
SELECT product_id, sale_date, sale_qty FROM SalesHistory ORDER BY sale_qty DESC;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM products ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT category, COUNT(*) AS total_products FROM products GROUP BY category;
SELECT * FROM sales WHERE quantity >= 10 AND total_price < 1000;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT sale_date, total_price FROM sales WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT product_id, forecast_date, predicted_quantity FROM forecasts WHERE actual_quantity < predicted_quantity;
SELECT product_id, stock_quantity FROM inventory WHERE stock_quantity < reorder_level;
